long_description: The OtterBox Defender iPad Mini Case helps keep your Apple iPad mini or iPad mini with Retina Display safe from bumps and bruises so you can enjoy your adventures worry-free. Rugged, multilayer case readies your device for heavy use and potential mishaps from your rough-and-tumble life. Share your iPad mini with your toddler, gregarious second grader and accident-prone friend without worry. Durable, 2-piece polycarbonate inner shell snaps together to form a snug fit; synthetic rubber slipcover wraps around the polycarbonate shell to defend against bumps and drops. Clear membrane screen protector in the inner shell guards against scratches and smudges while retaining the sensitivity of the touch screen. The OtterBox Defender iPad Mini Case provides added protection against drops, dust, bumps and shock but does not protect against water.
short_description: The OtterBox Defender iPad Mini Case helps keep your Apple iPad mini or iPad mini with Retina Display safe from bumps and bruises so you can enjoy your adventures worry-free.
